sentences.en: According to statistics, about 10 % of the prison population did not participate in labour in 1990.
sentences.cn: 据1990年的统计, 不参加劳动的犯人约占10%左右.

sentences.en: Every year between 30000 and 40000 Miaos participate in the festivities.
sentences.cn: 节日里,聚会的苗族同胞,每年有三四万人.

sentences.en: He has invited the all battle companions participate in his wedding party.
sentences.cn: 他邀请了所有战友参加他的结婚舞会.

sentences.en: He may personally participate in summit conferences.
His poems participate of the nature of satire.
I couldn't assent to, much less participate in such proceeding.
sentences.cn: 我对于这种举动并不赞成, 哪里还谈得上参与呢.

sentences.en: Not all citizens , however, could participate equally in the good life.
sentences.cn: 当然, 并不是所有的公民都同样有这样的好生活.

sentences.en: Several experts will participate as technical advisers.
sentences.cn: 几位专家将作为技术顾问参加.

sentences.en: Terry can't participate in the match because he has hurt his foot.
sentences.cn: 特里不能参加比赛,因为他扭了脚.

sentences.en: The people are demanding a chance to participate more in government.
sentences.cn: 人民要求更多的参与政事的机会.

sentences.en: They invited the world to participate in at international exposition.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请世界各国参加国际博览会.

sentences.en: User fees or other costs to participate in a computer network system vary considerably.
sentences.cn: 用户为加入计算机网系统而付的费用或其它费用差别很大.

sentences.en: We insist wanting his student to participate in this work.
sentences.cn: 我们坚持要他的学生参加这项工作.

sentences.en: We, too, cherish the opportunity to participate in the decision - making process.
sentences.cn: 我们也珍视参加决策过程的机会.

sentences.en: You may well participate with us in our gains.
sentences.cn: 你们完全可以跟我们共享利益.

words.tran_cn: 由多人一起参加的；（股票等）持有人有权分享利益的
供人分享的；吸引参与的

trans.tran_en: to take part in an activity or event
to take part in an activity or event
